item.title: Fly tip, 21st October
item.description:
Fly tip reported back in August, now closed as fixed even though nothing has been done. Additional waste being dumped every week, some of it in the middle of the road that we have to move to get vehicles through.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Lydenburg Street, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead rat on road, 21st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Halpin Place, Walworth, London

item.title: Outside Depot Point on Wicklow Street, 21st October
item.description:
I reported this drain blocked back on 1st September and my report was not actioned but this reference was given if reporting the same problem - 8118907. The drain is blocked. It needs unblocking. It's unclear why this is not being actioned.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Britannia Street, King's Cross, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I’ve reported this so many times rubbish all over grass areas, 21st October
item.description:
Rubbish all over grass area house hold litter, scooter, old rubber wheel this is offenham road, prestbury square , smarden grove been like this for weeks I’ve even gone and picked some up but needs addressing we need street cleaners as also there is so much slippery leaves and acorns as well please can this be sorted
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Offenham Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Beds and mattress on pavement, 21st October
item.description:
